pr_title: Added Unit Tests For Configuration Module

timeline.bodyText: Please add additional tests for DropSchemaObjects method (for now we have default, empty, null and wrong, but we also need some custom strings to be tested).

timeline.bodyText: Please add additional tests for CreateSchemaObjects method (for now we have default, empty, null and wrong, but we also need some custom strings to be tested)
